title: (Tues Full) Bobby Is Getting an Honorary Doctorate from the University of Arkansas + Amy’s Son Racked Up $200 Bill on a Video Game + Another Member Gets Eliminated from Movie Role
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Bobby Is Getting an Honorary Doctorate from the University of Arkansas + Amy’s Son Racked Up $200 Bill on a Video Game + Another Member Gets Eliminated from Movie Role
description:
Amy shares the amazing news that Bobby is getting an honorary doctorate from the University of Arkansas. Amy saw a weird charge on her account and found out that her son was buying coins on a video game by accident. It was $200 but he thought they were free! A member of the show was offered a role in a real Hollywood movie. Bobby eliminates another member of the show from contention for the movie role.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
